item.description:
***Please Update your RSVPs before we send this invite out to the general public and non-natives.***

Please join the Red Sox Natives for their first Annual Spring Training Kick-Off at 6 pm on Saturday March 12 at Scoreboard Sports Bar and Grille in Woburn as we prepare for the 2011 Red Sox season and Kiss Winter Goodbye with live music from the Herland Brothers. 

If you have never been to Scoreboard, it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park next to the Holiday Inn and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has 18 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. More info at http://www.tpsscoreboard.com.

Join us if you are a Red Sox Native veteran, rookie, or organizer. Join us if you are a Red Sox and Baseball fan. Join us if you want to become a member of the Natives. Join us if you have something Baseball to promote. Join us if you are sick of winter and like the Herland Brothers.

Think of the evening as a Doubleheader:

Game 1 begins at 6 pm. The Lineup includes:

Complimentary popcorn, wings and treats provided by Scoreboard. There is a Cash Bar.

Natives will have our own Reserved Section to meet, mix and mingle.

Meet and Greet with Red Sox Natives Founder Jon Mason and other Organizers.

Meet Native Mindy Finkelstien who is Representing the Natives in The May 22 Run To Home Base 9K at Fenway Park. Complete details are on the Natives calendar. 

Jon Mason will be collecting optional donations to support Mindy's $1,000.00 mandatory fundraising goal. A $15.00 optional on line donation (before March 12) or donation at the event gives you 5 tickets for our raffle. As an incentive each additional $5.00 donated gives you 5 more raffle tickets. Raffle drawing will take place at the event with some very special wine from Mindy's private collection. The drawing for the Grand Prize of 2 Yankees Tickets for Saturday, August 6 will take place on March 24 (No need to be present). AND IF YOU DONATE WE WILL GET YOUR NAME ON THE GUEST LIST TO ENTER FENWAY PARK, CHEER FOR MINDY AND WALK THE WARNING TRACK AFTER THE RACE (at Red Sox discretion). 

Participate in trivia and our 2011 Red Sox Fantasy Forecast Contest (Details to be announced)

Game 2 begins at 9pm The Lineup includes:

Hang out for optional, dinner, drinks and dancing with live music provided by the Herland Brothers at Scoreboard's Annual Kiss Winter Goodbye Bash. http://www.herlandbrothers.com Scoreboard will be packed after 8:30pm.

Please remember to maintain your own food and bar tab and tip your servers. 

Join us early or later. Wear your best Sox gear. Bring cool guests and friends.

There is no cover, however please RSVP here and update so Scoreboard can handle us. 

See you on March 12!

 

Fenway Frank
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Scoreboard hostess to direct you to our section. All Natives are encouraged to wear Red Sox gear.
item.why: It has been a long winter. Pitchers and Catchers have reported. The 2011 Red Sox are loaded and the season will be fun. It's time to begin the journey to the 2011 World Series.
item.name: Red Sox Natives 2011 Spring Training Kickoff & Kiss Winter Goodbye Bash
